name: @archway/valet
description: valet is a CSS-in-JS engine, a UI component kit, and an accessibility layer that treats all humans and their AI proxies as first-class users.
author: 0xbenc

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsup src/index.ts --format esm,cjs --dts --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json && cp -f src/styles.css styles.css
scripts.dx: npm install && npm --prefix ./docs install && npm --prefix ./packages/create-valet-app install && npm run mcp:server:install
scripts.dx:link: sh -c 'npm run build && npm link && cd docs && npm link @archway/valet && cd .. && npm --prefix ./packages/valet-mcp link && npm --prefix ./packages/create-valet-app link'
scripts.dx:unlink: sh -c 'cd docs && npm unlink @archway/valet || true; cd ..; npm --prefix ./packages/valet-mcp unlink -g || true; npm --prefix ./packages/create-valet-app unlink -g || true; npm unlink -g || true'
scripts.mcp:server:selfcheck: cd packages/valet-mcp && VALET_MCP_DATA_DIR=../../mcp-data npm run selfcheck
scripts.mcp:server:publish: npm run mcp:build && cd packages/valet-mcp && npm publish --access public
scripts.mcp:server:publish:patch: npm run mcp:build && cd packages/valet-mcp && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm publish --access public
scripts.mcp:server:publish:minor: npm run mcp:build && cd packages/valet-mcp && npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm publish --access public
scripts.mcp:server:publish:major: npm run mcp:build && cd packages/valet-mcp && npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm publish --access public
scripts.link:docs: sh -c 'npm link && cd docs && npm link @archway/valet'
